settings.code:
Technical Expertise

Fine Art Expertise: Our experienced fine artists specialize in creating and retouching custom paintings and images, ensuring they are perfectly suited for canvas or acrylic.


Digital Illustration Excellence: Our skilled digital illustrators are experts in crafting and refining custom designs and images, tailored for canvas or acrylic presentations.


We specialize in high-performance UV printing, delivering precision, efficiency, and versatility for various applications. Our printers feature Forefront Gantry Precision (FGP) technology for less than 0.1mm deviation, ensuring consistent, high-quality prints. Edge Excellence Technology improves border accuracy and reduces mechanical wear for longer-lasting performance.

Our innovative printing services bring your brand's identity to life, ensuring every detail is flawless. Whether it's branded merchandise or exclusive promotional materials, we focus on delivering impactful, high-end solutions tailored to your needs. At Aarohi PixelPrint, we believe every print tells a story-let us help you tell yours with creativity and professionalism.

Ideal for a wide range of materials, our solutions are perfect for personalized products, corporate gifts, custom accessories, and more.

settings.title: ColorJet VERVE mini
settings.text:
• High Print Capacity

settings.title: Roland DGXPRESS Series
settings.text:
• High-speed printing for maximum productivity.
  • Highly precise print expression.
  • Broad media compatibility.
  • Instantly drying prints for quick turnaround and finishing.
  • Speciality printing for textures and effects.

settings.text:

settings.title: Automatic Vinyl Lamination
settings.text:
